title: Rubiks Cube Machine Learning — 2019
description: My feeble attempt at an AI that can solve a Rubiks Cube.
The Rubiks Cube was represented as a 54 long vector, and all moves were represented as matrix operations.
The reasoning for this as opposed to a 3x3x6 array is written in more detail in the documentation.
This project was written in collaboration with Audrey Hou (audreyhou)!

title: Google Hash Code — 2019
description: I participated in Google Hash Code, a team programming competition, and scored 863,230 in the extended round.
Check out my teammates Kevin Palani (KevinPal) and Audrey Hou (audreyhou)!

title: Spark Final Project: Finding the speed of light — 2018
description: I was responsible for making data analysis code that finds the speed of light by interpreting data from an oscilloscope, function generator, laser, and photosensor.
In short, the code curve fitted and compared two 25MHz signals, one being delayed by a laser and photosensor.
We obtained and an of .
